snippet: From The Cleveland Herald. There is no greater abuse in the governmental policy of the United States, than the past and present system of Indian payments; and the Indians would be benefited if the money thus appropriated were cast into the Lakes, ...
lead_paragraph: From The Cleveland Herald. There is no greater abuse in the governmental policy of the United States, than the past and present system of Indian payments; and the Indians would be benefited if the money thus appropriated were cast into the Lakes, rather than made the cause of so much distress and swindling as it is.
abstract: The Indian annuities - frauds in payments
